title: Blazor Landing Page Web App
description: An open source code project for built modern website using blazor webasembly
section1text: Built a new modern website singgle page application using blazor webassembly . with razor page make your easy for change any design and content.
section2text: Built responsive website app using blazor landing page, free download and full source code include, you can customises with you needed for your project.
section3text: You can deploy on static hosting for live your website, just build for production mode and push and cloud hosting or your repo.
section4text: You can use json for best and fast solution for make content or article, Blazor as frontend can be integrate with your API from backend database.
